title: DATS biological entity schema
description: A biological entity is a recognized entity covering biological process, molecular functions or cellular components (from: http://geneontology.org/).

identifier.description: The identifier of the biological entity.

alternateIdentifiers.description: Alternate identifiers for the biological entity.

relatedIdentifiers.description: Related identifiers for the biological entity.

name.description: The name of the biological entity.

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.
